titles.title: Open Genetics Lectures (OGL) Fall 2015 - Full Text PDF

descriptions.description: Open Genetics Lectures - Fall 2015_FullRes_113MB.pdf This is a .pdf file of the Open Genetics Lectures Textbook (not old Open Genetics). ********* It contains: (1) a cover page, (2) supplementary pages, (3) a table of contents, (4) all 41 chapters, with questions, (5) answers to chapter questions *********** "This project/resource was funded in part by the Alberta Open Educational Resources (ABOER) Initiative, which is made possible through an investment from the Alberta government"

contributor.contributorName: U of Alberta, Department of Biological Sciences
